healthcare.title: Modern Care Powered by Intelligent Technology
healthcare.description: Oakwood helps healthcare organizations improve clinical outcomes, reduce operational friction, and prepare for AI-enabled care delivery.

industryChallenges.mainHeading: The critical obstacles healthcare teams face
industryChallenges.subDescription: Healthcare teams face rising patient expectations, increasing complexity across clinical systems, and growing pressure to deliver safe, coordinated, cost effective care.

cards.title: Fragmented clinical workflows
cards.description: Disconnected systems slow decision-making and create unnecessary administrative burden.

cards.title: Data locked in silos
cards.description: Critical patient and operational data is often scattered across EMRs, imaging, and legacy systems.

cards.title: Staff burnout and safety risks
cards.description: High workloads and mounting safety concerns impact retention and patient satisfaction.

howWeImprove.subDescription: Modernizing patient care, unifying data and strengthening collaboration to deliver safe, faster, and more connected patient care.

cards.title: Unify the data estate
cards.description: Oakwood brings clinical, operational, and financial data together to support real-time insights and AI readiness.

cards.title: Improve care team collaboration
cards.description: Harness modern communication, streamline collaboration, and maximize automation.

cards.title: Modernize clinical and operational systems
cards.description: Oakwood updates legacy applications, builds new digital tools, and integrates modern cloud solutions.

cards.title: Strengthen healthcare security and compliance
cards.description: Oakwood protects sensitive patient data with Microsoft security tools designed for regulated environments.

featuredCaseStudy.title: Airwatch to Intune Migration for Healthcare Organization
featuredCaseStudy.description: One of the largest nonprofit healthcare organizations in the United States looked to Oakwood's Cloud Team to assist in moving nearly 11,000 users utilizing 15,000 devices.

ctaSection.heading: Build a more intelligent health system
ctaSection.description: Enhance collaboration, secure sensitive data, and improve patient outcomes with modern cloud solutions.

manufacturing.title: Build Smarter, Faster, and More Resilient Operations
manufacturing.description: Oakwood helps manufacturers modernize production, streamline supply chains, and prepare for the next generation of AI-driven operations.

industryChallenges.mainHeading: The critical obstacles manufacturing teams face
industryChallenges.subDescription: Manufacturers are navigating supply chain disruptions, labor shortages, and the need to modernize systems without slowing production.

cards.title: Unpredictable supply chains
cards.description: Lack of real-time data makes planning and forecasting difficult.

cards.title: Aging systems and legacy applications
cards.description: Critical systems are outdated, costly to maintain, and difficult to integrate with modern tools.

cards.title: Growing cyber and IP risks
cards.description: Manufacturing systems and proprietary data are increasingly targeted by attackers.

howWeImprove.mainHeading: How Oakwood powers smarter manufacturing operations
howWeImprove.subDescription: Modernizing patterns, unifying data, and retooling plant floor intelligence to drive safer, faster, and more efficient production.

cards.title: Modernize and integrate critical applications
cards.description: Oakwood optimizes core systems and connects them to modern cloud platforms.

cards.title: Enable data driven operations
cards.description: Oakwood unifies manufacturing, quality, and IoT sensor data for predictive and AI insights.

cards.title: Enhance plant floor visibility
cards.description: Oakwood unifies workflows, dashboards, and IoT solutions that provide real-time operational insights.

cards.title: Protect intellectual property and operational systems
cards.description: Oakwood deploys Microsoft security tools to reduce IoT/OT risk.

featuredCaseStudy.title: Clarios accelerates Innovation with AMD-Powered HPC
featuredCaseStudy.description: See how Clarios slashed HPC workload times by 50% by using the AMD HPC Innovation Lab. What once took 12 hours now runs in just a few — results that speak for themselves.

ctaSection.heading: Transform how you design, build, and deliver
ctaSection.description: Enable efficiency, automation, and real-time insights across your manufacturing operations.

education.title: Modern Solutions for Learning and Public Services
education.description: Oakwood helps schools, state, and government agencies modernize their systems, secure their environments, and prepare for AI-driven operations.

industryChallenges.mainHeading: Key challenges facing education and public sector organizations
industryChallenges.subDescription: Aging systems, rising security demands, and limited resources make it difficult to deliver modern, accessible digital services.

cards.title: Aging and disconnected systems
cards.description: Legacy platforms slow service delivery and hinder modernization.

cards.title: Growing security and compliance expectations
cards.description: Schools and agencies are top targets for cyberattacks.

cards.title: Limited IT resources
cards.description: Lean teams struggle to support modern digital services.

howWeImprove.mainHeading: How Oakwood strengthens learning and public services
howWeImprove.subDescription: Oakwood helps organizations modernize systems, enhancing security, and improving data access to deliver more accessible and efficient digital services.

cards.title: Modernize core systems and applications
cards.description: Oakwood optimizes outdated platforms and enables a cloud-first approach.

cards.title: Strengthen security and compliance
cards.description: Oakwood deploys Microsoft security tools required for public sector accreditation needs.

cards.title: Unify and improve access to data
cards.description: Oakwood builds data platforms that enable reporting, insights, and AI.

cards.title: Enhance digital services for students and citizens
cards.description: Oakwood helps create intuitive, accessible user experiences.

featuredCaseStudy.title: Clarios accelerates Innovation with AMD-Powered HPC
featuredCaseStudy.description: Clarios slashed global HPC workload times by over 20X using the AMD HPC Innovation Lab. What once took 12 hours now runs in just a few — results that speak for themselves.

ctaSection.heading: Build a stronger future for the public you serve
ctaSection.description: Enable better outcomes with modern data, applications, and collaboration platforms.
